entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Int128 and UInt128 in API binding, ApiExplorer, etc. #43119
  • Blazor WASM: Recursive layout causes freeze and makes it unusable #43118
  • Page not found after changing chtml file #43116
  • System.Runtime error #43115
  • Open IBrowserFile.OpenReadStream() for two different InputFiles leads to timeout #43112
  • Release of project #43111
  • Blazor app is not starting when host environment name is changed from Development #43110
  • Log a message when ResourceManagerStringLocalizer cannot find a resource #43109
  • Perf improvement: mvc #43108

Closed

  • EventCallback not initiated #41967
    Discussions
  • IFormFile.OpenReadStream() “stream.ReadTimeout”引发了类型“System.InvalidOperationException”的异常 #43092
  • Update the Worker template to use the `Host.CreateApplicationBuilder` API. #43113
  • UseSpa UseReactDevelopmentServer logging incorrect #39147
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Fix Kestrel's Content-Length handling for 1xx, 204 and 205 responses and CONNECT requests #42956
    7.0-rc1
  • Double Page Declaration Causes Object Reference Not Set Error #39270
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security
  • [release/3.1] Suppress downgrade error in SharedFx bundle #43123
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Suppress downgrade error in SharedFx bundle #43122
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Sync output cache with API review #43121
    area-runtime
  • macOS dev-certs - Handle keychain paths with spaces #43120
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts
  • Fix route handler analyzer test culture warnings #43107
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Obsolete LeakTrackingObjectPool and LeakTrackingObjectPoolProvider #43106

Merged

  • Suppress downgrade error in SharedFx bundle #42857
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Kestrel Content-Length handling changes #43103
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Throw from OnConnected and OnDisconnected when using client results #42447
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc1
  • Update CODEOWNERS to catch more API updates #43105
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Remove IsAvailable check on CommitAsync. #43059
    area-runtime
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Add more info to UnrecognizedMediaType #43100
    area-runtime
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime
  • Updating HttpMethodMetadata based on ICorsMetadata #43077
    area-web-frameworks
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
    area-web-frameworks
